components.text:
Nick Rodriguez

Random thoughts, awesome mobile-friendly websites & tech for anyone.
components.buttons: For Windows For MAC Linux anything else

components.text: If you like Mobirise, please share it!

Blog

5/30/2015.  I fell upon Mobirise.  This is a crazy easy to use software for deploying mobile friendly websites quickly and easily.   It's usable on Mac or PC....sorry linux guys.

5/25/2015.   Today we experienced some crazy flooding.  we have received so much rain that Lake Travis has risen 20' in 30 days.   From being in severe drought to now way too much my office in San Marcos suffered significant damage.    Unfortuantely, my office had about 3 feet of water in it and almost everything was ruing including my diploma and frame.   Fortunately, I found that the Baylor seal is made from 1oz of .990 pure sliver....always a bright side.     Please continue to pray for those who lost everything.

January 2015.   I did something that I said I wouldn't every do again, GoRuck Challenge in Austin, Tx.   It was cold, raining and just miserable.   I think the only "advantage" I over others was that I have done it before.  But make no mistake that didn't make it any easier.   "All it takes is all you got"....

8/25/2015.   Mclane Stadium at Baylor opens and we attended the first game.  Tons of VIPs and a great stadium

​January 2014.  What the hell was I thinking?   Just finished my first GoRuck Challenge, miserable.  Why would anyone do this?   I learned alot about myself and my teammates but I wish we could have done in a less difficult way.   All I can say is the Cadre John aka "Big Daddy" was awesome.  There was nothing we did that he hasn't done for our country as a Marine without question.  Many kudos to our servicemen and women who don't know me, my friends or family but protect us everyday without question.

components.text:
Video embed

Online video and Youtube particularly is now more popular than cable television. Mobirise provides a support for YouTube and Vimeo that allow you to liven up your sites.
components.button: Learn more

components.text:
Crossfit & Soccer

I have been doing Crossfit for about 2 years now.   It's bizarre how much my body has changed.  I have grown so much in strength but I fight the daily struggle for cardi.   As of May 2015, I started playing soccer again and it's helped tremendously.   ....a lot of fun too!
components.buttons: crossfit soccer

components.caption1:
Bootstrap 3

Bootstrap 3 has been noted as one of the most reliable and proven frameworks.   We have used YII & Codeignitor but HTML5 & CSS3 are the future.
components.caption2:
CompCASt Scoring

Live Scoring Engine for Crossfit Competitions.  It's not just scoring but actual in-Heat up to the second updates of everyone's status.
components.caption3:
Accelerate 

A past project that is now wholly owned by Grande Communications.  The software allows for MSOs to sell Ethernet based services to the student housing industry.
components.caption4:
Mobrise Websites

Mobirise gives you the freedom to develop as many websites as you like given the fact that it is a desktop app.  Really cool!!!
